articles.description: The New York Yankees hit on all cylinders in a 9-1 rout of the Los Angeles Angels Tuesday night. It was as perfect a game as they've played all season.
articles.content: NEW YORK - Every so often you run across a box score thats so one-sided it practically jumps off the computer screen. And then theres once-in-an-orange-moon blowout thats so devastating mere numbers … [+5681 chars]

articles.title: What we learned as Giants beat Phillies in extras again - NBC Sports
articles.description: For the second straight game, the Giants scraped an extra-inning win against the Phillies.
articles.content:
PHILADELPHIA -- It wasn't pretty, and it certainly wasn't short. In fact, both teams should probably burn any video they have from Tuesday night's game at Citizens Bank Park.
